Commentary.Commentary: First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
Goal!  Watford 1, Newcastle United 0. Roberto Pereyra (Watford) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Abdoulaye DoucourÃ©.
Offside, Watford. Andre Gray tries a through ball, but Troy Deeney is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Roberto Pereyra (Watford) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Andre Gray with a through ball.
Attempt saved. Troy Deeney (Watford) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Attempt blocked. Etienne Capoue (Watford) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

Foul by Roberto Pereyra (Watford).

Foul by JosÃ© Holebas (Watford).
